languages.text: "Какая ирония..." {n}Морщась от боли, Руолдо жадно затягивается.{/n} "Последняя — самая сладкая".

traits.locale_text: "Спасибо". {n}Морщась от боли, Руолдо жадно затягивается.{/n} "Всю жизнь гонялся от смерти. Теперь — страшно".

languages.text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces in pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is always the sweetest."
languages.original_text: "Какая ирония..." {n}Морщась от боли, Руолдо жадно затягивается.{/n} "Последняя — самая сладкая".

traits.locale_text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces wth pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is the sweetest."

languages.text: “何等讽刺……”{n}罗尔多痛苦地皱起了眉，贪婪地深吸一大口。{/n}“最后一根麻烟总是最甜美的。”
languages.original_text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces in pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is always the sweetest."

traits.locale_text: “何等讽刺……”{n}罗尔多痛苦地皱起了眉，贪婪地深吸一大口。{/n}“最后一根麻烟总是最甜美的。”

languages.text: 「皮肉だな…」{n}ルオルドは、タバコを深く吸うと痛みで顔をゆがめる。{/n}「残り物には福がある」
languages.original_text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces in pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is always the sweetest."

traits.locale_text: 「皮肉だな…」{n}ルオルドは、タバコを深く吸うと痛みで顔をゆがめる。{/n}「残り物には福がある」

languages.text: «Qué ironía...». {n}Ruoldo hace una mueca de dolor y da una larga calada con avidez.{/n} «La última es siempre la más dulce».
languages.original_text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces in pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is always the sweetest."

traits.locale_text: «Qué ironía...». {n}Ruoldo hace una mueca de dolor y da una larga calada con avidez.{/n} «La última es siempre la más dulce».

languages.text: "İronik..." {n}Ruoldo, acıyla yüzünü buruştururken dalı derin, açgözlü bir şekilde içine çekiyor.{/n} "Son dal, her zaman en tatlısıdır."
languages.original_text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces in pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is always the sweetest."

traits.locale_text: "İronik..." {n}Ruoldo, acıyla yüzünü buruştururken dalı derin, açgözlü bir şekilde içine çekiyor.{/n} "Son dal, her zaman en tatlısıdır."

languages.text: « Quelle ironie... {n}Ruoldo grimace de douleur en tirant avidement une profonde bouffée.{/n} La dernière est toujours la meilleure. »
languages.original_text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces in pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is always the sweetest."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle ironie... {n}Ruoldo grimace de douleur en tirant avidement une profonde bouffée.{/n} La dernière est toujours la meilleure. »

languages.text: "Welch Ironie ..." {n}Ruoldo nimmt mit schmerzverzerrter Miene einen tiefen, gierigen Zug.{/n} "Der Letzte ist immer der beste."
languages.original_text: "The irony..." {n}Ruoldo grimaces in pain as he takes a deep, greedy drag.{/n} "The last one is always the sweetest."

traits.locale_text: "Welch Ironie ..." {n}Ruoldo nimmt mit schmerzverzerrter Miene einen tiefen, gierigen Zug.{/n} "Der Letzte ist immer der beste."
